title: Earning from Telegram? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: Abdul Razzaq from Ethiopia Assalamu Alaikum Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Wa'alaykumussalam Wa Rahmatullahi Wa Barakatuh Sheikh, is it permissible that the business can be now currently expanded barely on social media? Especially on Telegram The business can be shared and also that business is only by sharing each other and also by making tap-tap The people say that we can get any some coin or dollars from everybody that can unknown person I don't understand your question, Ya Abdul Razzaq How would a business be shared among the subscribers and Telegram and you will get dollars from that? I do not understand. You have to explain it in a more detailed and practical way with examples to know what kind of business generates money out of nothing, out of just marketing and selling What kind of business? What kind of product? Who are the target audiences? Who are the influencers used? Is there anything haram? All of these factors determine Allah knows best Thank you for watching
